attributes.title: The Science of The Intangible But Definitive Part of Existence  is Dharma,  Applied Science Is Agama
attributes.description:
15 March 2020

POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG

*MESSAGE FROM PARAMASHIVA DIRECTLY FROM SHRIKAILASA:
SCIENCE OF INTANGIBLE BUT DEFINITIVE PART OF EXISTENCE IS ‘DHARMA’ AND APPLIED SCIENCE OF THE INTANGIBLE BUT DEFINITIVE EXISTENCE IS CALLED ‘AGAMA’.

*I LOVE YOU GUYS. WITH MY ABSOLUTE LOVE FOR ALL OF YOU, I AM REVEALING THIS SCIENCE. FIRST, DROP THE STUPIDITY WHICH YOU ARE TAUGHT BY THE ATHEIST - THAT INTANGIBLE DOES NOT EXIST. NO! INTANGIBLE EXISTS AND IT MATTERS!

*ATHEISTS HAVE BRAINWASHED THE WHOLE WORLD WITH THE IDEA ‘INTANGIBLE DOES NOT EXIST’. ACTUALLY INTANGIBLE IS 99% OF YOUR LIFE. TANGIBLE IS 1% OF YOUR LIFE. THAT IS WHY IF YOU ARE AN ATHEIST, LIFE IS HEAVY FOR YOU AND YOU DON'T HAVE A FORMULA, PRINCIPLE, SUTRA, IDEA, UNDERSTANDING OF ANYTHING.

*WHEN YOU DENY THE EXISTENCE OF THE INTANGIBLE, YOU DESTROY YOUR VERY OWN EXISTENCE. INTANGIBLE BUT DEFINITIVE COMPONENTS OF YOUR LIFE HAS A GREAT SCIENCE, WHETHER IN YOUR LOGIC LEVEL, EMOTION LEVEL, FUNCTIONING OF THE MIND OR FUNCTIONING OF YOUR BODY - IN EVERY LEVEL.

*A SIMPLE EXAMPLE: PSYCHOLOGICAL SEXUAL PLEASURE IS INTANGIBLE BUT IT IS A DEFINITIVE PART OF ALL HUMAN BEINGS, LIKE WATCHING PORNOGRAPHY OR SEXTING. I AM NOT GETTING INTO THE SUBJECT OF WHETHER IT IS RIGHT OR WRONG. I AM ONLY SAYING, ALL OF THESE ARE INTANGIBLE, BUT ALL OF THESE HAVE A DEFINITIVE PART IN YOUR INNER SPACE.

*IF YOU ARE FASTING, WITHIN 2 - 3 DAYS, IN YOUR DREAM, YOU WILL BE FEASTING! IT MAY BE INTANGIBLE, BUT IT IS A DEFINITIVE PART OF YOUR EXISTENCE. AND IF YOU CONTINUE TO FAST WITH THE HIGHER POWERFUL COGNITION, THAT POWERFUL COGNITION WILL COME EVEN IN YOUR DREAM.

*FASTING IS THE MOST POWERFUL WAY TO PUT THE MOST POWERFUL COGNITION IN THE DEEPEST CONSCIOUS - CORE OF YOUR BEING. IT WILL BECOME REALITY JUST LIKE THAT!

*’INTANGIBLE BUT DEFINITIVE COMPONENTS OF YOUR LIFE’, THAT SCIENCE AND APPLIED SCIENCE IS THE WHOLE OF HINDUISM - VEDAGAMAS!

*HUMAN BEINGS KEEP ON GROWING AS LONG AS THEY UNDERSTAND, EXPLORE THE INTANGIBLE COMPONENTS OF LIFE AND COSMOS.

*IN THE LAST FEW DAYS I MADE A FEW STATEMENTS IN SATSANGH. RAIN IS THE SELF-PURIFICATION PROCESS OF NATURE. MAHAMARI IS THE SELF-PURIFICATION PROCESS OF PRAKRITI, PARASHAKTI. FASTING IS THE SELF-PURIFICATION PROCESS OF THE SYSTEM YOU ARE CARRYING. THERE ARE MANY INTANGIBLE COMPONENTS IN YOU WHAT YOU CALL AS YOUR LIFE.

*FASTING IS THE BEST WAY TO PURIFY ALL THE TANGIBLE AND INTANGIBLE COMPONENTS OF YOU. JUST A FEW STRAINS OF TOXINS IN YOUR SYSTEM IS ENOUGH TO MAKE YOUR WHOLE DAY HELL. EVEN IF YOU WIN A LOTTERY FOR BILLION DOLLAR, YOU WILL BE IRRITATED ABOUT THE TAX YOU NEED TO PAY OR YOU WILL BE ANGRY ABOUT SOME THIEVES WHO MAY COME TO STEAL YOUR MONEY. STRAINS OF TOXINS IS ENOUGH TO MAKE YOUR WHOLE DAY HELL!

*I READ A SMALL STORY! IT IS REALLY NICE - I WANT TO APOLOGISE TO YAMADHARMA, BECAUSE THE STORY IS LIKE MAKING FUN OF YAMADHARMA! ONE DAY YAMADHARMA COMES TO PLANET EARTH TO DO HIS JOB - HARVESTING LIFE. SOMEHOW, FOR WHATEVER MAY BE THE REASON, HE FELL IN LOVE WITH A GIRL! HE MARRIED HER, AND HAD A SON. AS USUAL, THE MIDDLE-AGE CRISIS STARTED AFTER 5 - 6 YEARS OF MARRIAGE! THE FIGHT AND THE WHOLE DRAMA STARTED. HE WAS NOT ABLE TO TAKE IT BECAUSE HE ONLY LIVED BY GIVING ORDERS, NOT TAKING ORDERS! THAT IS A LITTLE DIFFICULT IN MARRIAGE FOR HIM!

*FINALLY, HE DECIDED TO RUN AWAY AND ESCAPE BACK TO YAMA LOKA. HE HAD A SON. HE WAS BOTHERED ABOUT THE FUTURE OF THE SON. THE SON WAS JUST A KID. HE REVEALS HIS IDENTITY TO THE SON. HE MAKES HIM GROW OLDER THROUGH HIS POWERS AND TELLS HIM, ‘I GIVE YOU THE KNOWLEDGE OF MEDICINE, YOU WILL BECOME THE GREATEST VAIDYA - DOCTOR IN THE WORLD. BUT ONLY ONE CONDITION: WHENEVER YOU SEE ME, DON’T TREAT THAT PATIENT, BECAUSE IT MEANS THAT HE IS GOING TO DIE. YOU WILL HAVE A BAD NAME THAT YOU TREATED THAT PATIENT AND HE DIED. OTHERWISE, YOU CAN NEVER BE FALTERED. YOU WILL BE A DOCTOR WHO SAVES ANYONE YOU TOUCH!’

*THEN, YAMA DHARMA ESCAPES TO YAMA LOKA. THE WIFE CRIES AND SEARCHES EVERYWHERE! THAT IS THE BEAUTY OF THE INDIAN WIFE. THEY WILL FIGHT, BUT THEY WILL NOT BE AWAY FROM THEIR HUSBANDS.

*LIFE GOES ON AND THIS GUY BECOMES THE GREATEST PHYSICIAN IN THE WHOLE COUNTRY! THE WHOLE COUNTRY KNOWS THAT IF HE TOUCHES, THE PATIENT WILL BE HEALED. IF HE SAYS, ‘NO’, THEN SURELY THE PERSON WILL DIE. SO EVERYONE KNOWS THE SECRET. IF HE TOUCHES, THE PATIENT WILL BE SAVED, IF NOT, THE PATIENT WILL BE DEAD.
